price: Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang beriman dan beramal saleh, kelak Allah Yang Maha Pemurah 911 akan menanamkan dalam (hati) mereka rasa kasih sayang.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ سَيَجۡعَلُ لَهُمُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وُدّٗا
footnotes: 911.  Dalam Surah Maryam ini nama Allah Ar Raḥman banyak disebut untuk memberi pengertian bahwa Allah memberi ampun tanpa perantara.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti sayajʿalu lahumu al-raḥmānu wuddan
